          <title>
            <string language="sl">Diagram žarkov</string>
            <string language="en">Ray Diagrams</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Strahl-Diagramme</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Diagrammes de Rayon</string>

          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Diagram žarkov in določanje prave/navidezne slike pri ukrivljenem zrcalu.</string>
            <string language="en">Ray diagram and determining the real and virtual image in case of curved mirror.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">diagram žarkov</string>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">zrcalo</string>
            <string language="en">mirror</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ray Diagramm und die Bestimmung des realen und 
virtuellen Bildes falls von gebogenem Spiegel.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Rayonnez le diagramme et déterminer la vraie et 
virtuelle image en cas de miroir incurvé.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Irradie o diagrama e determinar a imagem real e 
virtual caso que do espelho curvado.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ray lo schema e la determinazione dell'immagine 
reale e virtuale nel caso dello specchio curvo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διάγραμμα του Ray και καθορισμός της πραγματικής και
εικονικής εικόνας σε περίπτωση κυρτού καθρέφτη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Irradie el diagrama y la determinación de la 
imagen verdadera y virtual en caso de que del espejo curvado.</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>
